General_Description: '''No More Red''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Our]] sea and our land is infected by the [[Peloponnesian League|red plague]]. Kill those [[Sparta]]ns."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Spartan [[soldier]]s and sank Spartan [[ship]]s all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
